Discover our services

  • Deep Cleaning

    A heavy clean to refresh your home! Remove built-up dirt and grime to make your space feel brand new. Deep Cleaning is the top choice for thoroughly cleaning your home down to the smallest detail. Perfect for preparing for a special occasion or simply treating yourself.

  • Standard Cleaning

    An economical, fast, but very efficient cleaning. Perfect for everyday cleaning for a spotless home. Keep your space always guest-ready with our standard cleaning service.

  • Move-in/out

    Moving? Let us handle the cleaning! Complete cleaning to get your old place ready for the next tenant and your new home ready for you. Our expert team provides a comprehensive clean, so you can focus on settling in.

  • Carpets & Upholstery

    Refresh your home with our expert carpet and upholstery cleaning service. We'll bring new life to your living spaces, ensuring a clean and comfortable environment for you and your family to enjoy.

  • Extreme Cleaning

    Is your place overwhelmed by clutter, damage, or neglect? Our Extreme Cleaning service is designed to handle the toughest and most critical cleaning challenges.

  • Eco-friendly

    Experience a healthier home with our eco-friendly cleaning service. We use non-toxic cleaning products and sustainable methods to leave your space sparkling clean.

  • Hire by the hour

    The flexible cleaning service that puts you in control! Whether you need one cleaner for a quick tidy-up or a team for a deep cleaning, you choose the number of cleaners and the hours that suit your schedule.

  • Post-construction

    Our post-construction cleaning service is designed to transform your newly renovated space into a clean and inviting home. We'll remove construction debris, dust, and odors, leaving your home looking its best.

  • Commercial

    Create a clean and professional workspace that boosts productivity and impresses clients. Our commercial cleaning services are tailored to meet the unique needs of your business.

  • AirBnB Cleaning

    Keep your guests coming back with our top-rated cleaning service. We'll ensure your guests will feel like home, helping you maintain a 5-star rating.

FAQ

Did not see your question?

Send us a message

  • When it comes to complete house cleanings, we generally offer a fixed rate, and you can find the approximate prices listed on our pricing page.

    Additionally, if you require cleaning for specific rooms or areas and not the entire house, we provide hourly pricing as well.

    Learn more

  • Flat-rate cleaning services are typically determined by the number of bedrooms and bathrooms in your home. This encompasses all living, dining, and kitchen areas.

    Additional spaces like studies or home offices are treated as bedrooms. Any unselected extras on the form are not part of the cleaning service.

    Learn more

  • We understand that plans can change, which is why we have a flexible policy in place. Through our

    Learn more

  • The number of cleaners sent depends on the size of the cleaning task, ranging from 1 to 6. For hourly services, the minimum of 3 hours always applies, with the price per hour per cleaner.

    Learn more

  • Clients can choose to be present or away during cleaning. If absent, access arrangements are needed. Cleaners assure responsible handling of your home, including locking up or key placement as per your instructions.

    Learn more
